about_the_game:
This is a sound set reminiscent of the 1990s consumer RPG games.
Through restricting the number of simultaneous sounds to mimic the hardware limitation of the days, these unique game tune styles of the 90s will color your work with a classic, nostalgic feel of the old days.

The set contains 14 tracks intended to be used in event scenes of various situations.

This set especially suits those who likes mildly emotional melodies of the 90s but with less "bleep” elements.

■Included music（ogg, m4a）
1.In the quiet of time
2.Suspicion
3.Illusion
4.Ambition
5.A gentle breeze smiles
6.Distant days
7.So I’m sad
8.Danger
9.Brave story
10.Lost time
11.I’ll go alone
12.Oath
13.For a lad
14.And the sun rises


・This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
・OK to be used in Commercial projects made in RPG Maker
・Rights must be indicated when using assets.
・You may modify some of the assets (but not redistribute them) for your own game use only.
・All copyrights, neighboring rights, and all other rights to this material belong to the creator or a third party authorized by the creator.
